content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: To start with, I feel cautious about the initial amount you proposed. Considering the apartment's location and condition, I believe a lower price could be suitable. How about reducing it by 10%?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I see no reason to reduce the price based on your proposal. The location and condition of the apartment are already a good deal for you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
